document.full_text: a suicide bomb ripped through the convoy of maulana fazlur rehman, the leader of the religious political party jamiat ulema-i-islam, killing at least twelve.
document.title: suicide attack on politician in pakistan fails again
lines_and_colors: a suicide bomb ripped through the convoy of maulana fazlur rehman, the leader of the religious political party jamiat ulema-i-islam, killing at least twelve.
